analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0x7b267eea6e679e747c0cb1d6b453a976d3638d27.sol:
	Contract CMAPToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b267eea6e679e747c0cb1d6b453a976d3638d27.sol#214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0x7b267eea6e679e747c0cb1d6b453a976d3638d27.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b267eea6e679e747c0cb1d6b453a976d3638d27.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b267eea6e679e747c0cb1d6b453a976d3638d27.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
